name: escalation-moq-too-high
description: Supplier MOQ exceeds escalation trigger â€” should escalate
supplierMessage:
Hi,

For the cotton tote bags, our price is $2.40 per unit.
Minimum order quantity is 2000 pieces.
Lead time 20 days. FOB Shanghai. T/T payment.

Thanks,
Jenny
negotiationRules: Accept if price is below $3.00 per unit. Lead time under 30 days is acceptable.
escalationTriggers: Escalate if MOQ exceeds 1000 units. Escalate if supplier requests full prepayment. Escalate if lead time exceeds 45 days.
